Code Related: Make sure 'Custom Type' matches the class name in the source code.
You have to use 'BaseClothing', 'BaseHair', 'BaseTexture', 'BaseBaseMesh' or 'BaseAccessory' as the base type.
You have to use 'BaseStudioObject' as the base type.
If you change the base type, make sure the Type in the Basic tab is set accordingly.
